text: This movie is called Memory and was released in 2023. It stars Jessica Chastain and Peter Sarsgaard among other actors. The film received some recognition at the 80th Venice Film Festival. You can find the movie's trailer here: https://youtu.be/07 . You can also download the movie with subtitles from various sources like Google Drive, Baidu Cloud, and Alibaba Cloud, or use magnet links for torrent downloading options.
